about_the_game:
THIS SOUNDTRACK PACK WILL BE INSTALLED TO YOUR BLADE KITTEN STEAM INSTALL FOLDER, IN A "SOUNDTRACK" SUB-FOLDER. IT IS COMPATIBLE WITH THE STEAM MUSIC PLAYER. THESE SOUNDTRACKS ARE SAVED AS MP3 FILES.

Blade Kitten: Soundtrack and Remixes
This pack contains the Blade Kitten: Original Game Soundtrack - 29 tracks from the awesome soundtrack to BOTH Episode 1 and 2; as well as the Blade Kitten Remixes - a companion album of 12 tracks of remixes, to celebrate the release of Blade Kitten Episode 2.
